resources.string: Unofficial Chapa In-App Purchase\n Android Library Sample App
It is a payment type that allow you to charge your customers to use your app.
Start accelerating your business with Chapa

# AppPayment - [Premium feature only] 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It allow you to charge your user to access your application content
Once the user paied, it launches your app's Main activity automatically
It is preferable if your app has not freemium feature
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
